subHeading: Personal Injury & Nursing Home Abuse Lawyers Pittsburgh and Western PA
valueProp: When Your Trust Is Broken, Put Experience On Your Side. Western Pennsylvania’s injured need someone to stand up for them. At Hal Waldman & Associates in Pittsburgh, we have extensive experience in nursing home abuse and neglect cases, as well as car accidents and other personal injury cases. You can trust us to put your case first.
